name: Lip and Sword
nutshell: The handsome president meets the lonely TV host (Sly Old Fox x Little Horse) Xing Ming was an outstanding med student who changed careers and entered the media industry, earning the title "Ice Prince". For the sake of clearing his father's name, he sacrificed his own body to climb the social ladder. When he opened that room door, however, what awaited him was…

name: Ojou-sama to Sono Shiyounin no Ojouji
Cobra: The Space Pirate
nutshell: An all-color alternate story of the original classic, Space Adventure Cobra.

name: Soredemo Machi wa Mawatteiru
nutshell: Arashiyama is a clumsy girl with a love for mysteries and a knack for getting into trouble. She works for an old lady’s lackluster maid café in a small shopping district. The cafe is largely unsuccessful in attracting customers aside from Sanada, a regular and one of Arashiyama's classmates (who has a secret crush on her). One day Arashiyama’s clever friend Tatsuno is invited to the café, and, upon seeing the miserable state of things (and Sanada, whom she has a secret crush on), decides to work there. Don’t miss the crazy antics of Arashiyama and friends, mismatched love stories, and all the hilarity that is created as a result, in Sore Machi.

name: Shiba Brothers
nutshell:
Two uber cute shiba , the black shiba is the big brother is cunning as well as being
despicable in nature , while the yellow shiba is the younger brother. dumb as stupid.
These two different personality shiba brother would create what kind of stories…
两只萌萌的柴犬，黑色的叫笨柴哥哥，属于萌贱的性格，黄色当然是笨柴弟弟咯，蠢萌性格，到底两种性格的兄弟会碰撞出哪些好玩的事情呢？

name: Tensei Shita Moto Dorei, Saikyou no Kizoku ni Natte Toshiue no Musume to Sekai Saikyou wo Mezashimas
nutshell: Louis, a fighter who fights slaves in the stadium. Finally loses his life in the match one day. However, the next time he opens his eyes he finds himself in a gorgeous mansion. Louis is reincarnated as the sixth son of a nobleman! And one day after more than a decade has passed, Sharon, a fellow slave from his previous life, appears in front of him.  Sharon, who was a child in his previous life, has grown into an adult woman older than him――!?

name: Shitsuji Kanzaki no Yuuutsu
nutshell:
Kanzaki is an extremely competent butler. Fluent in 4 languages, skilled in martial arts and works for the prestigious Tachibana family. The only thing that causes him concern is the sole Tachibana heir, Itsuki.
Itsuki, who enjoys sex and doesn't mind who he beds, one day also extends an invitation for Kanzaki to be held by him. Having held onto romantic feelings for Itsuki for so long and witnessing him in such a seductive state, Kanzaki reaches his limit. His feelings of lust and want runs wild!
1-2. Shitsuji Kanzaki no Yuuutsu
3. Mienai Teki ni wa Goyoujin
4. Hitosujinawa ja Ikimasen
5. Chuusainin Counter Attack
6. Sore ga Ki ni Nacchatte
7. Onzoushi Itsuki no Yuuwaku

name: Collection of parodies from xDOMITORIx
nutshell: A collection of stories... Parodies of all kinds of anime and manga by DOMITORI.

name: Yurucamp △
nutshell:
Rin, a girl camping by herself at the base of Mt. Fuji. Nadeshiko, a girl who came to see Mt. Fuji on her bicycle. The scenery the two witness over a supper of cup ramen marks the start of a new friendship and many adventures to come, camping in the great outdoors!

Links:

Official Twitter


Official Instagram
Official Drama Instagram
Official Anime (JP)
Official Drama (JP)

name: Healing Planet
nutshell: Satori Senjuin is a dense high schooler whose ebi sushi key holder comes alive one day as she's going home. It turns out Punipuni, a mousy-like little creature, who's from a different dimension, took the key holder's form. When Satori gets home, even more surprises wait for her. Her computer, that she supposedly turned off, starts talking, and it's telling her to become a Dimension Counselor?! What's that, and how does one heal a broken soul?

name: For Imperfect People
nutshell: Hoshi is just your average student until one day, he encounters an oddball upperclassman stuck inside a locker.

name: Chim Chim Cherry!
nutshell: The name of this manga sends us back to Mary Poppins and so the story is. The young nanny Cherry comes from far far away to Earth and starts dealing with four misbehaving kids of McGregor family. For that, she uses her wonderful medical bag and a fairytale encyclopedia which can bring its characters to life. Her sisters and talking squirrel mascot add in to a sweet girlish story.

name: Ryuui no Luca
nutshell:
わたしは“命”を諦めない。
竜医——様々な姿かたちを持つ“竜”と呼ばれる生き物を診る医者。
従軍竜医だった亡き父の「諦めたとき、目の前の命が終わる」という言葉を胸に竜医を目指す少女・ルカは、仲間とともに竜学院で学ぶ准竜医として病に苦しむ竜たちの治療にあたっていく。
だがルカの憧れの父にはひとつ重大な嫌疑がかけられていた——。
少女たちが命と向き合う“竜”医学ファンタジー！

name: Death Grid: The Sound of Death
nutshell: A collection of Horror one-shots.

name: The Hidden Blade
nutshell: The prince killed his father and ascended to the throne, and now the world is in chaos. In order to save the humans, Xu Han, a beggar, rebelled against the assassin organization [Hell Asura Clan] to overthrow the tyranny with his friends and to return the world to peace.

name: Hakomiya Gensou Gekijou
nutshell:
A One-shot that contains two short chapters:

The Summer of Gah and us.
The Moon and the Desert, and the Bomb Rocket

name: Koigokoro Clip
nutshell: With the girl you care about, with your senpai, with your childhood friend, with your teacher. They are excited, depressed, happy about trivial things, and happy to be together. Today, someone is falling in love. Today, somewhere, love is born. The love story of the girls that unfolds in the school.

name: The Day I Became My Sister
nutshell:
After an unexpected accident, distraught Tsubaki Tsukishiro is left in denial of his sister's death. But after a moment of despair, he has an epiphany,"I don't need to exist if my sister is here."
Donning his sister's clothes, he ventures out with the resolve to erase the existence of "Tsubaki" in favor of reviving "Chika". But while passing through the streets the day of her funeral, a man calls out to him with a single word,"Chika?"
A short story about two men desperately clinging onto the image of someone they so dearly love.
Note: This is not Shounen Ai. This is about a budding friendship born from two people dealing with a common loss.

name: Ze - Kami no Hon
nutshell: This volume contains spin-offs of the Ze series. Most of these were created for autograph events and freebies during purchases. There is also a 26-page compilation of never before seen material!

name: Sai:Taker - Futari no Artemis
nutshell:
In the future, an energy source called "Life" has become incredibly important. Certain people are able to synchronize with devices called "Sai" which gives them the ability to extract "Life" and have super powers. These people are known as "Sai Takers." Within the "Sai Takers" there is an even smaller group, "Original Takers." "Original Takers" have a contract with a magical device, and they can manipulate "Life" without the use of a "Sai." These powerful people are also immortal, and they only die if they run out of "Life." The world admires "Sai Takers," but "Original Takers" are careful to keep their identities secret.
Nanase Kyouya is an ordinary teenage boy, who moved in with the girls Igarashi Kyouka and Yuma after the death of his parents. Yuma is a "Sai Taker," but Kyouka is an "Original Taker." One day, he goes with them to see a new model under testing of a magical device, based after Kyouka's. After a deadly terrorist attack, Kyouka desperately contracts Kyouya to the new device model to save his life. The device has some side effects, however, one of which is that it transforms Kyouya into a girl! Now Kyouya is secretly an "Original Taker", and he must go to the elite "Sai Taker" school, as a girl, with Yuma. Will he be able to keep enough "Life" to stay alive? Will he be able to navigate his life as a girl? What other side effects of this device lie in wait for him?

name: Baccano! 1931 The Grand Punk Railroad
nutshell:
A group of homicidal maniacs, gangsters, terrorist, and some eccentric thieves all board the same train. Some want to rob it, while others just want to create chaos. On top of all this some of these people seem to be immortal, and a mysterious being called "Rail Tracer" is terrorizing the train. What are the mysterious origins of all these events, and who will be able to survive the train’s madness?
Based on a series of light novels.

name: Goshujinsama to wa Iwasemasen!
nutshell: Matsuoka is a transfer student whose wish is to make 100 friends. He gets along with his classmates almost at once, and it all looks be smooth sailing, until he crosses paths with the school's most feared delinquent, Sougo! One thing leads to another and… Sougo ends up becoming Matsuoka's slave!?

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as Kosaku Shima
nutshell:
Mikami Satoru, 37 years old, virgin, was stabbed to death. When he wakes up, he'll be reincarnated as a slime — except not, he was reincarnated as [Shima Kosaku]!?
What would happen if the protagonist of the [Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken] was reincarnated as [Shima Kosaku] instead of a slime!?
This special edition release lets you read and compare the original materials of [Shima Kosaku] and [Tensura] that appears in this ultimate imagining, extremely most-discussed book [Tensei Shitara Shima Kosaku] .
Takes place between Chapters 5 & 6 from [Kachou Shima Kosaku] and chapter 1 from [Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken].

name: Star Star Star - Horoscope Cafe
nutshell: "A tale of constellations, extraordinary people, and their horoscope cafe!"

name: Akuyaku Reijourashiku, Kouryaku Taishou wo Fukujuu Sasemasu: Oshi ga Dame ni Natteite Kaishaku Chigai Nandesu kedo!?
Horeta Otoko wa Shin'yuu de
nutshell:
“So this is what you’ve become? Not that I care though.”
Yoichi and Shige have been best friends since elementary school. Yoichi used to like Shige but he decided to forget about it in order to stay friends.
However, their relationship completely changed after Shige shockingly said “Hey Yoichi, let me taste your dick?” In the blink of an eye, it was inside Shige’s mouth?!
He was supposed to have given up but his body and mind were provoked by a very passionate fellatio. An unexpected sound that came out ignited Shige’s greed and caused things to escalate?!
An abandoned first love rekindled and a possessive reckless love between two best friends!

name: Mr Dior
nutshell: A ridiculous story about two presidents who have been married for seven years. In which, the one who’s scared of his wife hit his head too hard and suddenly became a truly domineering president.

name: DEAD Tube
nutshell: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!

name: Touhou - Rumble (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Komachi x Parsee doujin.

name: Touhou - Canni-Can (Doujinshi)
nutshell: While Rumia eats her monthly rations, she finds a ring in it that seems to possess a will.

name: River God Seeks Adoption
tags: Official Colored,Action,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell: One day, out of nowhere, a gorgeous man calling himself a River God appears before Lin Lu. This Stunning beauty then begs Lin Lu to adopt him. Urging for a contract to be made between the two. What will Lin Lu decide? And can this River God's words be believed?

name: Tang Yin in Another Realm
nutshell:
His body has different abilities and talents, but he has not found many ways to use them in the real world, all he can do is to be a professional killer's job. But at least after going to a different world, where there is only fighting or death on the battlefield its strength will appear differently. The Reaper's name known is Tang Yin (a.k.a Brother Don)…
Official English 2: https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5b9a3a0546e67872b72795b7
